price: У Аллоҳ тарафидан юборилган Пайғамбар бўлиб, покиза саҳифаларни тиловат қилур.
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
